text: Allahe kono manuharae'i abhyantarata duta hrdaya srsti karaa na'i. Tomalokara straisakalara majata yibilakara lagata tomaloke yihara karaa, te'om sihamtaka tomalokara matr karai diya na'i arau tomalokara tolaniya putra bilakako te'om tomalokara prakrta putra karai diya na'i. E'ibora tomalokara mukhara kathahe. Allahe kerala satya katha'i kaya arau teraemi sarala patha nirdesa karae
